1: <pb/>A ton listail eb yinatil Adán ti': Set, Enós,
4: Noé <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Noé: a ton Sem, Cam c'al Jafet.
5: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Jafet: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javán, Tubal, Mesec, c'al Tiras.
6: Axa eb c'ajol Gomer: Askenaz, Rifat c'al Togarma.
7: Axa eb c'ajol Javán: a ton Elisa, Tarsis, Quitim c'al Rodanim.
8: <pb/>Eb c'ajol Cam: a ton Cus, Misraim, Fut c'al Canaán.
9: Eb c'ajol Cus: a ton Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama c'al Sabteca. Axa eb c'ajol Raama: a ton Seba c'al Dedán.
10: A Cus tu' a ton is mam Nimrod. A jun winak tu' caw wal mimanbil yuj yikbej bay yulyibank'inal.
11: <pb/>A yin Mizraim, a tu' max tit eb ludeo, eb anameo, eb lehabita, eb naftuhita,
12: eb patruseo, eb casluhita c'al eb caftorita. A yin eb tu' max tit eb filisteo.
13: <pb/>A Sidón, a ton is babel c'ajol Canaán. A junxa is c'ajol, a ton Het.
14: Yinatil c'apax Canaán tu' eb jebuseo, eb amorreo, eb gergeseo,
15: eb heveo, eb araseo, eb sineo,
16: eb arvadeo, eb zemareo c'al eb hamateo.
17: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Sem: a ton Elam, Asur, Arfaxad, Lud c'al Aram. Axa eb c'ajol Aram: a ton Uz, Hul, Geter c'al Mas.
18: A Arfaxad tu' a' ay is c'ajol Sala, axa Sala tu', a' ay is c'ajol Heber.
19: A Heber tu', ay cawan is c'ajol: a jun babel chi yik Peleg, yujtol a yul is tiempoal max pojchajtok tx'otx' tx'otx'. Axa jun yuẍtak Peleg tu' chi yik Joctán.
20: A Joctán tu', a' ay is c'ajol eb ti': Almodad, Selef, Hasarmavet, Jera,
23: Ofir, Havila c'al Jobab. A masanil juntzan ti' is c'ajol Joctán c'al eb.
24: <pb/>A ton listail eb yinatil Sem ti': Arfaxad, Sala,
27: c'al Abram a ton cham Abraham.
28: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Abraham: a ton Isaac yetok Ismael.
29: <pb/>Axa yinatil Ismael tu': a ton Nebaiot is babel c'ajol, yetok Cedar, Abdeel, Mibsam,
31: Jetur, Nafis c'al Cedema. A ton juntzan is c'ajol Ismael ti'.
32: <pb/>A pax juntzan yune' Cetura xin, a ton xal yet is cab yistzil Abraham: a ton Zimram, Jocsán, Medán, Madián, Isbac c'al Súa. Axa pax eb c'ajol Jocsán: a ton Seba c'al Dedán.
33: Axa eb c'ajol Madián: a ton Efa, Efer, Hanoc, Abida c'al Elda. A masanil juntzan ti' yinatilc'al xal Cetura eb.
34: <pb/>A cham Abraham, a' ay is c'ajol Isaac. Axa eb c'ajol Isaac a ton Esaú c'al Israel.
35: A eb c'ajol Esaú: a ton Elifaz, Reuel, Jeús, Jaalam c'al Coré.
36: Axa eb c'ajol Elifaz: a ton Temán, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, Cenaz c'al Amalec yune' xal Timna.
37: Eb c'ajol Reuel: a ton Nahat, Zera, Sama c'al Miza.
38: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Seir: a ton Lotán, Sobal, Zibeón, Aná, Disón, Ezer c'al Disán.
39: Axa eb c'ajol Lotán: a ton Hori c'al Hemam. A Lotán, ay jun yanab chi yik Timna.
40: Axa eb c'ajol Sobal: a ton Alván, Manahat, Ebal, Sefo c'al Onam. Axa eb c'ajol Zibeón: a ton Aja c'al Aná.
41: A Aná tu', a' ay is c'ajol Disón, axa eb c'ajol Disón: a ton Hemdán, Esbán, Itrán c'al Querán.
42: Eb c'ajol Ezer: a ton Bilhán, Zaaván c'al Jaacán. Eb c'ajol Disán, a ton Uz c'al Arán.
43: <pb/>A ton juntzan ti' max yak' reyal bay Edom yet c'amto reyal Israel chi oqui: A Bela c'ajol Beor, a is conob chi yik Dinaba.
44: A yet max cam Bela, axa Jobab is c'ajol Zera, aj conob Bosra, a' max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok.
45: Axa yet max cam Jobab, axa Husam max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok. A jun tu', aj lugar yul makbej Temán.
46: Axa yet max cam Husán, axa Hadad c'ajol Bedad max occan is q'uexelok. A jun tu' max ak'on ayc'ay Madián bay ac'al yet Moab. A is conob chi yik Abit.
47: A yet max cam Hadad, axa Samla max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok. A jun tu', aj conob bay Masreca.
48: A yet max cam Samla, axa Saúl max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok. A jun tu', aj conob bay Rehobot; a jun conob tu', junej ay yetok a' miman Éufrates.
49: A yet max cam Saúl, axa Baal-hanán, is c'ajol Acbor max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok.
50: A yet max cam Baal-hanán, axa Hadad max occan yin reyal is q'uexelok; a is conob chi yik Pau. A yistzil Hadad tu', chi yik Mehetabel is cutz'in Matred, yitxiquin Mezaab.
51: <pb/>A yet max camtok Hadad tu', a eb max oc yin yajawilal bay Edom: a ton Timna, Alva, Jetet,
54: Magdiel, c'al Iram. A ton juntzan ti' max yak' yajawilal bay Edom.
